channel.title: OpenAir on Nishadh KA
channel.description: Recent content in OpenAir on Nishadh KA

item.title: Installing R and Openair in Ubuntu1204
item.description: Installation of R in Ubuntu 12.04, there are deb packages available for R from its source page here However, after installation, it shows error in installing openair package, and dependency chain goes from 2 to 10 and much more package with version mismatch problem, starting from lattice saying Error: package ‘lattice’ was built before R 3.0.0: please re-install it Even calling package by the library(lattice’) given error So installation in apt-get library might be a problem-solving step, followed these
